QuestData.Title: Whisper of Hope
QuestData.Description:
Akarek's demise has cast a dark shadow upon our house... but it is in the shadows where we thrive.
I know that not all the Eyes have perished. They could lie in wait, hidden for eternity, if such was demanded of them.
But it is time to reclaim our destiny. Take my sigil through the wreckage and awaken any Eyes who remain.
We will seize our victory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Vashj's Sigil to rally survivors of the House of Eyes.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Whisperer Vyn beneath Nurakkir.
QuestData.RewardText: The baroness inspires great dedication. I trust in her plans.

Objectives.Objective: Rally survivors with Mark of Vashj
